item.title: Control plane Team Lead
item.description: Responsibilities: As a team leader you will help introduce and guide work methodologies, technologies, mentor and ramp up new developers, and be the go-to person in the areas you are an expert at. Lead the GO developers team and work closely with the Cloud Team leader. Writing technical design docs, tracking tasks and deadlines, help and troubleshooting The Go developer tech lead will stay hands on and develop 60% of his position.

item.title: Categories Post
